main_topic.author: yamitomo
main_topic.title: What do you think about Gemma 2b-it?
main_topic.content:
Even when I tell the model that you are a "questioner," it mistakes me for an "questioner" and asks questions that can't be answered with a yes/no, so I feel like its performance is low.

What do you think?

comments.author: CchristoC
comments.content: You should just use the Gemma 7b one or Llama 3 8B
comments.date: Posted a month ago  ·  107th in this Competition
